name: allocate_vaccines_script
description: This tool is designed to generate scripts that automate the distribution of vaccines to specified regions based on the policy.

distribution_policy.description: The policy that dictates how vaccines should be distributed among the regions (including equal and dynamic).

name: list_infection_data
description: This tool is designed to list the infection data for different regions.

name: list_vaccine_centers
description: Lists all registered vaccine distribution centers.

name: set_distribution_priority
description: Set the distribution priority of a specified center.

center_name.description: The name of the vaccine distribution center.

distribution_priority.description: The new distribution priority of the specified center
